title: What is this?!?!
content:
Hello everyone, I just took over maintaining a site for a client and apparently the previous designer lost all the files related to the site so I’m editing images from scratch.

I have identified most fonts but I’m stuck on this particular one. Does anyone recognize it??

Extremely grateful for any assistance.

 [‹ Subtitling font used in norwegian broadcasting](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123095059/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45656 "Go to previous forum topic") [The Hound of the Baskervilles cover typeface ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123095059/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45676 "Go to next forum topic")
author: WMW

comments.content: Wow, you guys are good! Thank you!
